marcus_approaches.speaker: Narrator
marcus_approaches.text: Marcus approaches the counter with an unusual hesitance in his step.

marcus_speaks.speaker: Marcus
marcus_speaks.text: I have a request. It's... personal. There's a dish I've been searching for. One I had many years ago.

request_details.speaker: Marcus
request_details.text: It was called the Wanderer's Feast. A traveling cook made it for our guild before... before everything changed.

player_response.speaker: Narrator
player_response.text: How do you respond to his request?

choices.text: Tell me more about it. I'll try to recreate it.
That sounds like quite a challenge.

accept_challenge.speaker: Marcus
accept_challenge.text: *His eyes brighten* You'd do that? It's a complex dish - hearty meat, forest herbs, and a special blend of spices from distant lands.

acknowledge_difficulty.speaker: Marcus
acknowledge_difficulty.text: It is. But if anyone can do it, I believe it's you. Will you try?

quest_details.speaker: Marcus
quest_details.text: If you can recreate it... perhaps it would help me finally make peace with the past.

quest_accepted.speaker: Narrator
quest_accepted.text: You've accepted Marcus's request to recreate the Wanderer's Feast. You'll need to gather rare ingredients from distant zones.
